about_the_game:
This is a new and creative card game where players are free to make cards to fight enemies.

Players take on the role of a character who breaks into a magical tower with unique enemies on each floor.

Sweep away all opponents by crafting cards.

Game Features

  • Card Maker: Design and generate your own cards during battle.

  • Potion Juicer: Use your imagination to create the most effective potions.

  • Game Assistant: Big Fish Assistant will remind you often, but you can ignore it.

  • Never Ending: Players will not fail to end the game, but climb the tower non-stop.

    Become a one-card superhero No matter how strong the enemy is, with precise preparation, often you only need one card to win. Want to try? Become a one-card superhero!

short_description: Extremely creative card game where players don't need to build any decks. No matter how powerful the enemy is, you can create unique cards and win with one card! You don't need to become bald to become stronger, want to become a One-Card Hero?
